item.title: Say hello to Doks 👋
item.description: Use the standard setup or easily make it your own. Demo doks.netlify.app Build on Hyas Get all the Hyas goodness: Security aware Fast by default ⚡️ SEO-ready Development tools (linting, cleaning) Bootstrap framework Netlify-ready (functions, redirects, headers) Plus Full text search — using FlexSearch 🚀 Page layouts (landing page, blog, documentation layout) Dark mode — switch to a low-light UI with the click of a button And 100 scores on Google Lighthouse A+ scores on Mozilla Observatory Get started There are two main ways to get started with Doks:
